title: (x) photojournalist, Workshop in body text - Classico {Angel}
content:
This is probably easy, but I just can't find a face with a 'W' and a pointed 'j' that looks like this. I need to identify this quickly – anyone?

author: katju

comments.content: You could very well be right. :^)
Classico it is, tested the italics too. Thank you!!!
